name: Teo
overview: Teo is a side-scrolling platform game. The aim of the player is to reach the designated number of blue spheres. All the levels are full of hostile animals, poisonous plants and weeds, fire flames and other obstacles. Besides the blue spheres the player may collect numerous fruits (extra energy) scattered on the board, hearts (extra life), safety helmet (temporary invincibility) or use trampoline arrows for performing high jumps. The hostile creatures may be killed by a jump on their head. After each three levels the player receives a stage code.
